segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so determined, but that stool looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel his excitement as he grabs another cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, her hand outstretched like she’s begging for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, just polishing that plate like nothing’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught, but I also hope they don’t fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, and the floor is wet—this is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at their teamwork, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re so focused on the cookies, just like the woman is focused on her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR
